description: Nothing stops us outdoor lovers from getting outside. And their Women’s Intraknit™ Active Full Zip Jacket was made with this in mind. They've combined the softness and cooling properties of TENCEL™ Lyocell fibers with the moisture management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance of Merino for a jacket that’s always performance-ready. Four-way stretch and wind-resistant front panel keep you moving in comfort. And with mesh ventilation knit in all the right spots, this jacket helps keep you from overheating. So no matter what the weather’s looking like, you can go far and feel good.
name: Intraknit Active Full Zip Jacket - Womens

specs.value: 48% Merino Wool, 23% Polyester, 20% Tencel™ Lyocell, 9% Elastane, 1% Nylon - Exclusive of Decoration
